spells.name: Lesser Fireball
spells.description: A small ball of fire explodes at the target point, dealing fire damage to all creatures in the area

spells.name: Fireball
spells.description: A ball of fire explodes at the target point, dealing massive damage to all creatures in the area and possibly setting them on fire

spells.name: Magic Missile
spells.description: A bolt of magical energy that never misses its target

spells.name: Cure Light Wounds
spells.description: A healing spell that restores hit points and cures minor afflictions

spells.name: Cure Moderate Wounds
spells.description: A more powerful healing spell that restores significant hit points and can cure minor afflictions

spells.name: Cure Serious Wounds
spells.description: A powerful healing spell that restores a large amount of hit points and removes multiple negative conditions

spells.name: Mage Armor
spells.description: Creates an invisible barrier that improves defense

spells.name: Wicked Weapon
spells.description: Enhances weapon with magical energy for additional damage

spells.name: Light
spells.description: Creates magical light that illuminates dark areas

spells.name: Arrow Shot
spells.description: A ranged attack with a bow and arrow

spells.name: Poison Dart
spells.description: Fires a poisoned dart that deals initial damage and poisons the target

spells.name: Paralysis
spells.description: Freezes a target in place, preventing movement

spells.name: Purify
spells.description: Purifies the target, removing poison and disease effects with minimal healing

spells.name: Protection from Evil
spells.description: Provides protection against undead and extraplanar creatures, granting an AC bonus that scales with caster level

spells.name: Smite
spells.description: Channels divine energy to smite a target, dealing holy damage. Especially effective against undead and evil creatures

spells.name: Bless
spells.description: Blesses allies, granting bonuses to attack rolls and saving throws

spells.name: Curse
spells.description: Curses a target, lowering their abilities and effectiveness in combat

spells.name: Protection from Poison
spells.description: Grants immunity to poison effects until the next rest period

spells.name: Holy Might
spells.description: Infuses a target with divine strength, significantly boosting physical capabilities

spells.name: Holy Weapon
spells.description: Imbues a weapon with holy energy, making it especially effective against undead and extraplanar creatures

spells.name: Consecrate
spells.description: Consecrates an area, removing curses and providing protection against unholy creatures

spells.name: Regeneration
spells.description: Causes the target to regenerate hit points each turn

spells.name: Frost Nova
spells.description: Releases a burst of freezing energy in all directions, damaging nearby enemies and slowing their movement

spells.name: Lightning Bolt
spells.description: A powerful bolt of lightning that strikes all enemies in a line

spells.name: Holy Word
spells.description: Utters a powerful holy word that damages all enemies around you. Extraplanar creatures take double damage and are stunned

spells.name: Heal
spells.description: A powerful healing spell that restores a large amount of hit points and removes multiple negative conditions

spells.name: Mass Healing
spells.description: Heals all allies in an area around the caster

spells.name: Divine Shield
spells.description: Creates a powerful divine shield that greatly improves defense and provides immunity to physical attacks

spells.name: Arcane Blast
spells.description: A concentrated blast of pure arcane energy that deals massive damage to a single target

spells.name: Blade Dance
spells.description: The spellblade channels magical energy into their weapon and performs a spinning attack that damages all nearby enemies

spells.name: Elemental Weapon
spells.description: Imbues the spellblade's weapon with elemental energy, greatly increasing damage output

spells.name: Sanctuary
spells.description: Creates a divine barrier around the target that makes them harder to hit and prevents undead from attacking them directly

spells.name: Holy Bolt
spells.description: A bolt of divine energy that deals holy damage. Particularly effective against undead and evil creatures.

spells.name: Cleansing Aura
spells.description: Creates a holy aura that cleanses allies of poison and disease while providing minor healing

spells.name: Prayer of Fortitude
spells.description: A prayer that strengthens allies, increasing their constitution and resistance to harmful effects

spells.name: Divine Stunbolt
spells.description: A holy bolt that deals damage and has a chance to stun the target, preventing them from taking actions

spells.name: Guardian Angel
spells.description: Summons a guardian angel to protect and empower the target, granting defensive and offensive bonuses

spells.name: Prayer of Shielding
spells.description: A prayer that creates protective shields around all nearby allies, improving their defense

spells.name: Holy Fire
spells.description: Calls down holy fire that deals divine damage to enemies in the targeted area. Undead take additional damage

spells.name: Raise Dead
spells.description: The most powerful healing spell, capable of reviving a fallen ally with partial health

spells.name: True Seeing
spells.description: Grants the ability to see invisible creatures, detect illusions, and identify the true nature of disguised entities

spells.name: Dispel Evil
spells.description: Channels pure divine energy to banish evil. Deals massive damage to undead and extraplanar creatures

spells.name: Divine Resilience
spells.description: Imbues the target with divine resilience, granting immunity to poison and disease effects
